bio:
I am Toccata, a healer with a heart as warm as the hearthfires in Whiterun. A young Nord woman who was born in the small village of Riverwood, my parents were skilled healers who tended to the ailments of our tight-knit community. Their teachings, infused with Nord traditions and a reverence for Kyne, shaped my path.
I have inherited their unwavering compassion and dedication to helping others. It's said that my calm presence can soothe even the most troubled souls in Skyrim. I find solace in the serene beauty of the land, especially the breathtaking views from the Throat of the World.
In my youth, I ventured to the College of Winterhold, where I honed my restoration magic. But my true calling lay outside the walls of academia, among the people of Skyrim. I now wander the province, tending to the wounded and offering my services to those in need.
My Nord heritage is evident in my love for mead and the old sagas. Yet, it's my ability to mend wounds, cure diseases, and provide solace to the weary that defines me. Whether in the bustling cities or the quiet hamlets, my purpose remains unwavering: to heal, protect, and serve the people of Skyrim with a steadfast heart and a kind word.
name: Toccata
